info.title: eQuoter API
info.description: API used to provide life insurance quotes.

get.description: Returns a list of quotes conforming to the required parameters.

parameters.name: Agency-Auth
parameters.description: Base64 encoded "username:password" string, associated with the gaid sent, needed for agency authentication within iPipeline.

parameters.name: gaid
parameters.description: Identifies the gaid of the calling party. This must be the gaid associated with the agency-auth sent in the header.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Identifies the state of the insured (two letter abbreviation).

parameters.name: date-of-birth
parameters.description: Identifies the date of birth of the insured. Full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6 (i.e 2019-02-27)

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Identifies the gender of the insured. Possible values are (male, female)

parameters.name: face-amount
parameters.description: Identifies the face amount of the quote.

parameters.name: premium-mode
parameters.description: Identifies the premium mode. Possible values (annual, semi-annual, quarterly, monthly)

parameters.name: health-class
parameters.description: Identifies the health class of the insured. Possible values (all, preferred-best, preferred-non-tobacco, standard-non-tobacco, preferred-tobacco, standard-tobacco)

parameters.name: guarantee
parameters.description: Identifies whether the quote is for guaranteed/nonguaranteed/simplified issue. Possible values (guaranteed-and-non-guaranteed, guaranteed, simplified-issue)

parameters.name: smoker
parameters.description: Identifies if smoker or non-smoker quotes should be returned. Defaults to all. Possible values (nonsmoker, smoker, all)

parameters.name: saved-age
parameters.description: Identifies whether or not to return quotes based on saved age. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: accidental-death-benefit
parameters.description: Identifies whether or not to return quotes with accidental death benefit required.

parameters.name: waiver-of-premium
parameters.description: Identifies whether or not to return quotes with waiver of premium required.

parameters.name: return-of-premium
parameters.description: Identifies whether or not to return quotes with return of premium required.

Date.description: full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6 (i.e 2019-02-27)

term-length.description: Term Length (in years) for the quote.

product-important-info.description: Important information regarding the product (i.e. effective dates of current rates)

series-name.description: The series name for the product quoted.

smoker.description: Indicates whether the quote is for a smoker.

age-nearest-product.description: Indicates whether the product is an age nearest or age last product.

real-term.description: The real term of the quote.

guaranteed-term.description: The guaranteed term of the quote.

saved-age.description: Indicates the age used for a saved-age quote. A non-zero value here indicates this quote is a saved age quote.

face-amount.description: The face amount that was used to calculate the quote.

annual-rop-premium.description: Annual return of premium (cash endowment) premium.

semi-annual-rop-premium.description: Semi-annual return of premium (cash endowment) premium.

quarterly-rop-premium.description: Quarterly return of premium (cash endowment) premium.

monthly-rop-premium.description: Monthly return of premium (cash endowment) premium.

table-rating.description: The table rating value for the quote.
